fullText: ‘Twas the night before Christmas, and all through the White House.

tweetBy.description: 46th President of the United States, husband to @FLOTUS, proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/HDhBZBkKpU Text me: (302) 404-0880

fullText: This Christmas Eve, Jill and I got to speak with some excited young Americans who happened to be very curious about the whereabouts of one Santa Claus. Thankfully, @NoradSanta confirmed that St. Nick is on his way!

tweetBy.description: 46th President of the United States, husband to @FLOTUS, proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/HDhBZBkKpU Text me: (302) 404-0880

fullText: This Christmas Eve, my wish for you and your family is that you take a few moments of quiet reflection and find that stillness that's at the center of the Christmas story. May you find peace in this silent night. And warmth from those surrounding you.

tweetBy.description: 46th President of the United States, husband to @FLOTUS, proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/HDhBZBkKpU Text me: (302) 404-0880

fullText: Willow Biden, the Official White House Ornament Inspector.

fullText: When I came to office, most Americans assumed that bipartisanship was impossible. I never believed it. This year, we've made real progress –. Together.

tweetBy.description: 46th President of the United States, husband to @FLOTUS, proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/HDhBZBkKpU Text me: (302) 404-0880

fullText: We passed a law making it easier for health providers to prescribe effective treatments for opioid addiction and, for the first time, Naloxone became available over the counter at grocery stores and pharmacies across the country.

tweetBy.description: 46th President of the United States, husband to @FLOTUS, proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/HDhBZBkKpU Text me: (302) 404-0880

fullText: This year is proof that there's much more that unites us than divides us. But there is so much more to do. Here's to delivering more progress in 2024.

tweetBy.description: 46th President of the United States, husband to @FLOTUS, proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/HDhBZBkKpU Text me: (302) 404-0880

fullText: I’m working towards a future where every American can turn on the faucet and drink clean water. My bipartisan infrastructure law and small businesses like Hero Plumbing will take us there.

tweetBy.description: 46th President of the United States, husband to @FLOTUS, proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/HDhBZBkKpU Text me: (302) 404-0880

fullText: Last holiday season, hundreds of travelers were stranded for days, some spending Christmas at an airport. It's unacceptable. This year, nine major airlines heeded our call and will guarantee free rebooking, meals, and hotels if they're at fault for a travel interruption.

tweetBy.description: 46th President of the United States, husband to @FLOTUS, proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/HDhBZBkKpU Text me: (302) 404-0880

fullText: Jill and I had the honor of spending the afternoon at Children's National Hospital reading with some of the strongest kids and parents there are. Our hearts are with them this Christmas.

tweetBy.description: 46th President of the United States, husband to @FLOTUS, proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/HDhBZBkKpU Text me: (302) 404-0880

fullText: Ready for St. Nick.

tweetBy.description: 46th President of the United States, husband to @FLOTUS, proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/HDhBZBkKpU Text me: (302) 404-0880

fullText: Today marks a milestone with inflation over the last six months falling to the pre-pandemic level of 2%. But while my plan to get us back on track is working, prices are still too high for too many Americans. I’m laser focused on lowering costs — from insulin to energy bills.

tweetBy.description: 46th President of the United States, husband to @FLOTUS, proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/HDhBZBkKpU Text me: (302) 404-0880

fullText: America was founded on the principle of equal justice under law — our criminal justice system can and should reflect this core value that makes our communities safer and stronger. That’s why I’m announcing additional steps to make the promise of equal justice a reality.

tweetBy.description: 46th President of the United States, husband to @FLOTUS, proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/HDhBZBkKpU Text me: (302) 404-0880

fullText: Second, I’m issuing a Proclamation that will pardon additional offenses of simple possession and use of marijuana under federal and D.C. law. Too many lives have been upended because of our failed approach. It’s time we right these wrongs.

tweetBy.description: 46th President of the United States, husband to @FLOTUS, proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/HDhBZBkKpU Text me: (302) 404-0880

fullText: Just as no one should be in a federal prison solely due to the use or possession of marijuana, no one should be in a local jail or state prison for that reason, either. I continue to urge Governors to do the same with state offenses and applaud those who have since taken action.

tweetBy.description: 46th President of the United States, husband to @FLOTUS, proud dad & pop. Tweets may be archived: https://t.co/HDhBZBkKpU Text me: (302) 404-0880

fullText: This year, during our nationwide college tour, I met with over 15,000 young leaders who are on the frontlines of the fight for our fundamental freedoms. It is because of them, I know our future is bright.

tweetBy.description: Fighting for the people. Wife, Momala, Auntie. She/her. Official account is @VP.

fullText: As the holiday season approaches, let us take a moment to offer our gratitude to our frontline workers, first responders, and service members who are away from their families. Thank you for everything you do to keep us safe.

tweetBy.description: Fighting for the people. Wife, Momala, Auntie. She/her. Official account is @VP.

fullText: Assault weapons are weapons of war, designed to kill a lot of people quickly. They have no place on the streets of civil society. It is time to renew the assault weapons ban.

tweetBy.description: Fighting for the people. Wife, Momala, Auntie. She/her. Official account is @VP.

fullText: While Democrats want to ban assault weapons, extremist MAGA Republicans try to ban books.

tweetBy.description: Fighting for the people. Wife, Momala, Auntie. She/her. Official account is @VP.

fullText: I am in favor of the Second Amendment—and I’m also in favor of an assault weapons ban, universal background checks, and red flag laws. We can do both.

tweetBy.description: Fighting for the people. Wife, Momala, Auntie. She/her. Official account is @VP.

fullText: 42 states, and D.C., have expanded Medicaid coverage for postpartum care from 2 months to 12 months. I look forward to the remaining states answering my call to help address the maternal health crisis.

tweetBy.description: Fighting for the people. Wife, Momala, Auntie. She/her. Official account is @VP.

fullText: Zero Republicans in Congress voted for the Inflation Reduction Act. Curious that some members of Congress who voted “no” are still touting its results!

fullText: Our foundational freedoms are on the line as extremist so-called “leaders” work to ban abortion, endanger women's lives, and criminalize doctors. President @JoeBiden and I will continue to fight for the right of every woman to make decisions about her own body.

fullText: This year has tested us in many ways, but Christmas is a reminder of the power of community to keep us together even in difficult times. Wishing you all a peaceful holiday.

tweetBy.description: Dad, husband, President, citizen.

fullText: We’re seeing record ACA enrollment by Americans for the third year in a row. More than 15.3 million people have signed up — and you can join them. Go to  to sign up before January 16.

tweetBy.description: Dad, husband, President, citizen.

fullText: Rosalynn Carter’s life is a reminder that no matter who we are, our legacies are best measured not in awards or accolades, but in the lives we touch. We send our thoughts and prayers to Jimmy and the entire Carter family during this difficult time.

tweetBy.description: Dad, husband, President, citizen.

fullText: Rustin – the latest film from @HGMedia – celebrates the life and legacy of Bayard Rustin, a giant of the civil rights movement and the architect of the 1963 March on Washington. Check out his story today on Netflix.

fullText: At our @ObamaFoundation Democracy Forum, we brought together hundreds of leaders from around the world to talk about how we can create a more inclusive and sustainable economy that works for everyone. Take a look:

fullText: On Veterans Day, we honor all the brave men and women who have served our country in uniform. You deserve our thanks and support.

fullText: Yesterday, voters across the country turned out for the values we’re fighting for – because they know state and local elections matter.

fullText: In Virginia — where every single seat in the General Assembly was on the ballot — voters gave Democrats the majority in both the Senate and House of Delegates, preventing Republicans from passing a radical conservative agenda.

fullText: I’m also proud of all the Obama-Biden alumni running for office. Last night, @GabeAmo became Rhode Island’s first Black representative, and @PhilforVirginia joined Virginia's House of Delegates. As we head into 2024, let’s keep organizing, keep voting, and keep making our….

fullText: To our @CanadianForces members: Thank you. Your service and sacrifice have not gone unnoticed. Whether you’re spending your holidays with your loved ones, or are serving across the country, or are deployed beyond our borders, we’re keeping you and your families in our thoughts.

fullText: With our new Canadian Dental Care Plan, we’re making dental care more affordable and more accessible. Applications open this month, starting with seniors who are 87 and older – and we’ll continue to expand eligibility throughout 2024. More details here:

fullText: I spoke with @David_Cameron today. I congratulated him on his new role – and we discussed the conflict between Israel and Hamas, and Russia’s war against Ukraine. Canada and the UK are committed to addressing these and other foreign policy issues together.

tweetBy.description: Father, @liberal_party Leader, 23rd Prime Minister of Canada. | Papa, chef du @parti_liberal, 23e premier ministre du Canada.

fullText: When @GantzBe and I spoke today, I reiterated Canada’s support for Israel’s right to defend itself in accordance with international law. I also stressed the importance of protecting civilians, and ensuring safe and unimpeded access to humanitarian aid for civilians in Gaza.

tweetBy.description: Father, @liberal_party Leader, 23rd Prime Minister of Canada. | Papa, chef du @parti_liberal, 23e premier ministre du Canada.

fullText: I expressed support for urgent efforts toward a sustainable ceasefire, underscoring that this cannot be one-sided – Hamas must stop using civilians as human shields, lay down its arms, and can play no role in the future governance of Gaza. More here:

fullText: From my family to yours, I want to take this opportunity to wish everyone a Merry Christmas and a happy and healthy New Year.

fullText: This year the trade union movement has proven once again that when workers stand together in the pursuit of economic justice, they can achieve what was once thought impossible. Solidarity forever!.

fullText: Congratulations to the FIOM and FIM-CISL unions — this is a step in the right direction for Lamborghini. With exploding technology and increased worker productivity, it’s time we move all workers toward a four-day work week.

tweetBy.description: U.S. Senator for Vermont. Not me, us.

fullText: It is outrageous that right-wing judges and politicians in Texas and across the country are risking women's health and safety by denying their right to abortion and other reproductive health care. We must continue the fight to once again make abortion legal and safe.

tweetBy.description: U.S. Senator for Vermont. Not me, us.

fullText: Corporate greed is Mark Zuckerberg becoming $3.4 billion richer TODAY while building a $100 million mansion in Hawaii with 30 bathrooms and an underground bunker. Meanwhile, a record-breaking 653,000 Americans are homeless & over 60% of our workers live paycheck to paycheck.

tweetBy.description: U.S. Senator for Vermont. Not me, us.

fullText: This week Cigna said it would be spending $11.3 billion not to lower premiums, deductibles, or improve health care for its policy holders, but to buy back its stock to make its executives and stockholders even richer. This is what a corrupt & broken health care system looks like.

tweetBy.description: U.S. Senator for Vermont. Not me, us.

fullText: If Ascension can afford to pay its CEO over $13 million in compensation after raking in $6.4 billion in revenue, it can afford to treat its health care workers in Kansas & Texas with respect. Not lock them out for 4 days after launching a 1-day strike to improve patient safety.

tweetBy.description: U.S. Senator for Vermont. Not me, us.

fullText: The United States must do everything it can to put pressure on Netanyahu’s right-wing extremist government to end this disastrous military approach, which is causing such horrific damage to human life in Palestine.

tweetBy.description: U.S. Senator for Vermont. Not me, us.

fullText: .@AIPAC is a right-wing organization that supports extremist Republican election-denier candidates. Now, they want to spend $100 million to defeat Progressives. Whether AIPAC likes it or not, the U.S. must not give a blank check to Netanyahu’s horrific war policies.

tweetBy.description: U.S. Senator for Vermont. Not me, us.

fullText: I stand with the 2,000 nurses at Ascension hospitals in TX and KS who have been locked out of work after their one day strike yesterday. In 2021, the CEO of Ascension made more than $13 million. Ascension can certainly afford safe staffing to protect nurses and patients.

tweetBy.description: U.S. Senator for Vermont. Not me, us.

fullText: I believe that it would be irresponsible for us to provide an additional $10.1 billion in unconditional military aid that will allow the Netanyahu government to continue its current offensive military approach.

tweetBy.description: U.S. Senator for Vermont. Not me, us.

fullText: Change is coming. The question is: What kind of change will it be? Will it be a Trump authoritarian change which divides us up based on the color of our skin or where we were born. Or one that brings us together to achieve economic & social justice and a world of human decency.

tweetBy.description: U.S. Senator for Vermont. Not me, us.

fullText: Let me congratulate the UAW for its new organizing campaign to unionize 150,000 US workers at non-union auto plants owned by companies like Tesla, Nissan, Toyota and BMW. We cannot expand and strengthen the middle class without a vibrant, strong and growing trade union movement.

fullText: Billionaires buying candidates and elections is what oligarchy is all about. It's not just Nikki Haley or Republicans, it's both parties. We need real campaign finance reform and public funding of elections.

fullText: I was so sorry to hear of the death of Alistair Darling. He was a towering figure in Labour politics and he always brought wit, wisdom and intellect to his work. My thoughts are with his family.

fullText: We’ve won some big victories for working families in Massachusetts and across the country, but there’s a lot more to do. So today I’m making it official: I’m running for re-election to keep up the fight.

fullText: Gun violence is striking people everywhere—their homes, their playgrounds, the movies, at school. Enough is enough is enough. I’ll keep working to protect our children and our communities, including by banning military-style assault weapons.

fullText: The Biden-Harris administration is fighting back against Big Pharma’s greed: under a new proposal, if taxpayer dollars helped develop a drug—and if the company holding the patent has blocked access by jacking up the price—other companies could produce lower-cost generics.

tweetBy.description: U.S. Senator, former teacher. Wife, mom (Amelia, Alex, Bailey, @CFPB), grandmother, and Okie. She/her. Official campaign account.

fullText: Big Pharma is fighting tooth and nail to try to stop this reform, but we’ve got to see it through. This is part of how we make our government work for families, not just Big Pharma.

tweetBy.description: U.S. Senator, former teacher. Wife, mom (Amelia, Alex, Bailey, @CFPB), grandmother, and Okie. She/her. Official campaign account.

fullText: This year, nearly 300k Americans got hit with sledgehammer news that they have prostate cancer. Then came another sledgehammer: the cost of treatment. A drug called Xtandi could save their lives but costs up to $190,000/year. It’s a familiar story of corporate greed.

tweetBy.description: U.S. Senator, former teacher. Wife, mom (Amelia, Alex, Bailey, @CFPB), grandmother, and Okie. She/her. Official campaign account.

fullText: A reminder: the people in power don’t need conferences, treaties or agreements to start taking real climate action. They can start today. When enough people come together then change will come and we can achieve almost anything. So instead of looking for hope - start creating it.

fullText: Climate justice activists all over the world stand in solidarity with @MahrangBaloch_ and other peaceful protesters who have been detained, tortured and disrupted by Islamabad police for protesting against human rights abuses in Balochistan. #MarchAgainstBalochGenocide.

fullText: Phasing out fossil fuels is a bare minimum. We need drastic immediate emission cuts and binding commitments from the largest contributors of the climate crisis to finance loss and damages, adaptation and a just transition in the most affected areas. 2/3.

fullText: We cannot talk about climate action without addressing the root causes of this crisis and without having MAPA in the room. Let’s call this COP out for what it is - another betrayal and a stab in the back. #FridaysForFuture #ClimateStrike .3/3.

fullText: Climate strike week 278. The final outcome of #COP28 is not a “historic win”, it is yet another example of extremely vague and watered down texts full of loopholes that in no way is even close to being sufficient for staying within the 1,5° limit and ensure climate justice. 1/3🧵
